data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 27818, Version Hash: 7d13aa7bcb796cc0880c4307679f090bc3a6d442
data.actual_result: Multiple instances of discord opens, each one with its own loading screen
data.expected_result: Discord should just open right where it was left at, like tabbing back into the app.
data.short_description: Opening discord from taskbar opens another instance of Discord. **Win8.1 Specific**
data.steps_to_repro: - launch discord - close the app once loaded (x button, not full close) - click the task bar discord - wait until discord loads - repeat - discord should know be open 2+ times as separate instances
